description: This is a React-like component (using LightningJS framework) defining an 'Empty State' view, which prompts users to create their first note in a note-taking application. It includes UI layout, style, and interaction logic for an onboarding prompt.

classes.name: EmptyState
classes.description: A LightningJS component that displays an ocean-themed prompt for creating the first note. It manages UI rendering, focus, and dispatching actions to the store to add and select notes.

methods.name: _template()
methods.description: Defines the LightningJS visual template, including layout, styling, and child components.

methods.name: _init
methods.description: Initializes internal actions from the store.

methods.name: set onCreate
methods.description: Public setter to assign a callback that executes after creating a note.

methods.name: _handleEnter
methods.description: Handles 'Enter' key event, triggers note creation.

methods.name: _getFocused
methods.description: Returns the component that should receive focus, here the action button.

methods.name: _focus
methods.description: Handles focus by animating the button and showing focus ring.

methods.name: _unfocus
methods.description: Removes focus visuals from the button.

methods.name: _handleEnterRelease
methods.description: NoOp to prevent multiple triggers when button is held.

methods.name: _createNote
methods.description: Dispatches actions to add a new note and select it, and calls onCreate callback with new note ID.

methods.name: mountTo
methods.description: Static method to instantiate and attach the component to a parent stage.
